title: The Wolves of Odin
description: Can Holly and her friends stop the sinister Dr. Hardcastle from conquering the world? Time Struggle is a riveting new adventure series about the History Wars, a battle between those who want to change the past for their own evil purposes and those who try to stop them. Holly has a rare mental ability enabling her to travel in time, and is chosen as part of an elite action team, along with Aldo, Wolf, and super-nerd Rubrik. Their adventures lead from the bleak Icelandic outback to the troll-haunted forests of Norway, and even as far as Asgard, the land of the Norse gods. Chased by warriors, dwarfs and giants, the four must find a way to undo the time crime of Dr. Hardcastle then somehow return to the present. It certainly won't be easy... This exciting, action-packed adventure is suitable for readers aged 10 to adult.
author: A.K. Forest
